pages.name: Serenade of the Nether
pages.text: Use a Ritual Diviner for easier contruction.
Generates a source of lava from the master ritual stone.$(br2)$(fire)Fire Runes: 4$()$(br2)Total Runes: 4

pages.title: Raw
pages.text: Decreases the LP cost of placing lava and allows lava to be placed insided of a linked container.

pages.title: Corrosive
pages.text: Entities within range that are immune to fire are damaged severely.

pages.title: Vengeful
pages.text: Entities in this range are afflicted by Fire Fuse.

pages.title: Destructive
pages.text: Lava placement range is increased based on total Will.

pages.title: Steadfast
pages.text: Players in this range have Fire Resist applied.
